verbs.description: [ARG0: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal attorney ,] [V: solicited] [ARG1: a payment of at least $ 1 million] [ARG2: from the government of Qatar] [ARGM-TMP: in late 2016] , [ARGM-PNC: in exchange for access to and advice about the then - incoming administration] , [ARGM-ADV: according to several people with knowledge of the episode] .

Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , solicited a payment of at least $ 1 million from the government of Qatar in late 2016 , in exchange for access to and advice about the then - incoming administration , [V: according] to several people with knowledge of the episode .
